lines.speaker: Unknown
lines.text: Hello there, could i get a pack of hotshots and… I would also like Chicken Jerky, thank you.

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: Hello man, gimme a second ...

lines.speaker: Unknown
lines.text: You sure buddy?

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: Ya, ya, no problem.

lines.speaker: Unknown
lines.text: Oh, nice I always hate when they waste my time with checking IDs

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: Ha, Yes! I give the customer what they really want without making the wait.

lines.speaker: Unknown Man
lines.text: Thanks buddy. A thing that I need to warn you about is that I am a police officer. My name is Larry Baige

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: Ohh...

lines.speaker: Larry Beige
lines.text: Is that a problem for you?

lines.speaker: Unknown Man
lines.text: Ah can we skip this part, I hate the process. I don't look old enough for you? My name is Larry Beige and I am 32...

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: No it is not that, but there are rules and I have to enforce them, otherwise if I let you go I might let others go without ID as well, you know how it goes

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: So, can I check your ID?

lines.speaker: Larry Beige
lines.text: Mhm…explained like this sounds reasonable. Sorry, here you go

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: All good now..wait…. You are a police officer?

lines.speaker: Larry Beige
lines.text: Yes, is that a problem for you?

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: No, of course not

lines.speaker: Larry Beige
lines.text: Also you mind if I smoke one here real quick?

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: No, can you please go away I have to sell to others?

lines.speaker: Larry Beige
lines.text: You are making a mistake kid. So far you have been loving your guiltiness to me, it doesn't look good for you. You came here to inspect me not to buy…

lines.speaker: Larry Beige
lines.text: I will be back kid, you will get what you deserve

lines.speaker: Larry Beige
lines.text: Is that a problem for you?

responses.responseText: No can you please go away I have to sell to others (Rebellious)
Go ahead. As long as there is no one else here. Company is always welcomed. (Continue)

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: As long as there is no one else here. Company is always welcomed.

lines.speaker: Larry Beige
lines.text: You mentioned that SSI is pretty new for you, but I wonder how so it has been out for quite a while?

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: Well I just came back from vacation, it was quite long

lines.speaker: Larry Beige
lines.text: That sounds nice, I really need to travel somewhere, where were you?

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: I was to the Eastern part of the Union. Very beautiful place but they didn't have SSI and I think still haven't integrated it there. Their technology is quite old…

lines.speaker: Larry Beige
lines.text: OK…that makes sense now, yes the project is in full scale only in our region, there are a few tweaks to be made. Do you think it is fair for it to be enforced in full force since it is so new?

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: I can't really say for now I haven't had any issues with it, the system operates very smoothly

lines.speaker: Larry Beige
lines.text: Hmmm is that so….I have heard about some shady figures walking around the town.

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: Shady how? What do they do?

lines.speaker: Larry Beige
lines.text: Smart question… Sorry I didn't catch your name?

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: My name is Clerk. Nice to meet you….Larry…Larry Beige. Cool name.

lines.speaker: Larry Beige
lines.text: You dont have to lie..

lines.speaker: Larry Beige
lines.text: I am kidding HAHA… Anyway nice to meet you Clerk, you seem like a good kid that is why I am telling you this. There are guys that steal data

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: How do they do that?

lines.speaker: Larry Beige
lines.text: They cannot pass through the security so their only way is getting the information from a person that has it already in their device

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: So they ask people for their information and then steal it for their use

lines.speaker: Larry Beige
lines.text: Most of the time to sell it for money for the big companies outside our Union, Yes exactly! But not only…You see Clerk that would be impractical

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: And why is that? If I was a criminal that would be probably my strategy, sounds simple

lines.speaker: Larry Beige
lines.text: You sound like a bad criminal Clerk. As you mention it is simple yes, but not easy.

lines.speaker: Larry Beige
lines.text: I have heard some shady dealings, nothing too major but I would like more

responses.responseText: I haven't done anything. But can you tell me more?

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: But can you tell me more?

lines.speaker: Larry Beige
lines.text: Interesting… I have heard some shady dealings, nothing too major but I would like more

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: Are the shady dealings related to my store

lines.speaker: Larry Beige
lines.text: Yes indeed. Yours is not the only one but you are first on the list

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: Wait are there other Kiosks related

lines.speaker: Larry Beige
lines.text: Yes all 5 in fact. Oh I didnt even know we did have that many. This town is small but it has been a mess lately, there are a lot of figures that are trying to steal data and use it to their advantage

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: Sounds rough, please tell me how can I help

lines.speaker: Larry Beige
lines.text: My head has been a mess lately as well. I cannot see the big picture, can you tell me anything you heard?

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: I only had one encounter. There was a shady guy that came to the Kiosk and demanded information. I didn't get a lot of information because I immediately send him away.

lines.speaker: Larry Beige
lines.text: He didn't mention anything? Or anything you noticed?

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: He had a white coat and faces was a bit hidden hard to see him well. What I remember is he offered 1000 NEUROS

lines.speaker: Larry Beige
lines.text: That is a sizable reward why did you turn it down?

responses.responseText: I am not mad, the money is good but the crimes I commit are way higher.

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: Make a joke

lines.speaker: Larry Beige
lines.text: Interesting… I have heard some shady dealings, nothing too major but I would like more

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: Are the shady dealings related to my store

lines.speaker: Larry Beige
lines.text: Yes indeed. Yours is not the only one but you are first on the list

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: Wait are there other Kiosks related

lines.speaker: Larry Beige
lines.text: Yes all 5 in fact. Oh I didnt even know we did have that many. This town is small but it has been a mess lately, there are a lot of figures that are trying to steal data and use it to their advantage

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: Sounds rough, please tell me how can I help

lines.speaker: Larry Beige
lines.text: My head has been a mess lately as well. I cannot see the big picture, can you tell me anything you heard?

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: You know, if I ever quit this job, I think I’ll become a police officer. Seems like the only job with more paperwork than mine.

lines.speaker: Larry Beige
lines.text: HAHAHA…Well said clerk. I like You. But let’s not get off track, tell me.

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: I only had one encounter. There was a shady guy that came to the Kiosk and demanded information. I didn't get a lot of information because I immediately send him away. He had a white coat and faces was a bit hidden hard to see him well. What I remember is he offered 1000 NEUROS

lines.speaker: Larry Beige
lines.text: That is a sizable reward why did you turn it down?

responses.responseText: I am not mad, the money is good but the crimes I commit are way higher.

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: What exactly have you heard?

lines.speaker: Larry Beige
lines.text: Careful now kid, normally people just deny

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: Denying does not prove innocent, nor asking questions disprove it. I just want to understand the situation

lines.speaker: Larry Beige
lines.text: Well listen then, word has it that there has been data leaks, which is normal. But also that someone is selling the data. That is a bit more curious.

lines.speaker: Larry Beige
lines.text: Well said Cashier, thank you. I think I have concluded my research for today. The investigation will continue. I will be back… if needed…

lines.speaker: Larry Beige
lines.text: Well said Cashier, thank you. You made things easier I have concluded my research! The investigation is concluded…
